Richard Eyimofe Evans Mofe-Damijo (amuru 6 Julaị 1961), onye amara dika RMD, bu onye n'eme ihe nkiri, odee, onye na-emeputa ihe na onye oka iwu Naijiria
Ọ bụkwa kọmishọna na-ahụ maka omenala na njem nlegharị anya na Delta steeti
N'afọ 2005, o meriri ihe nrite bu ihe nkiri Africa Movie Academy Award maka onye na- eme ihe nkiri kacha mma n'ọrụ ndu
Ọ nwetara ihe nrite na 12th Africa Movie Academy Awards na 2016
A mụrụ Mofe-Damijo na obodo Aladja nke obodo Udu Kingdom, Delta Steeti
Ọ gara Midwest College, Warri na Anglican Grammar School ma bụrụ onye otu Drama Club
Ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum Benin ka ọ gaa n'ihu gụọ akwụkwọ wee gụọ akwụkwọ Theater
N'afọ 1997 Mofe-Damijo laghachiri na mahadum ka ọ mụọ iwu na mahadum Lagos wee gụchaa na 2004
Mgbe Mofe-Damijo gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, o sonye na ihe nkiri onyonyo na njedebe 80 nke a na-akpọ Ripples
Tupu mgbe ahụ, o nwere akwụkwọ akụkọ Concord  na Magazin Metro  dị ka onye nta akụkọ
Out of Bound bụ ihe nkiri izizi nke ọ nwetara otuto onye ode akwụkwọ / onye nrụpụta
N'afọ 2005 na mbipụta mbụ nke Afrika Movie Academy Awards Mofe-Damijo nwetara ihe nrite maka onye na- eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na ọrụ ndu
Na 5 Januwari 2017, ọ kwadoro 2016 ihe nrite  GLO-CAF tinyere onye nta akụkọ Naijiria Mimi Fawaz

A họpụtara Mofe-Damijo ka ọ bụrụ onye ndụmọdụ pụrụ iche nke omenala na njem nlegharị anya  nye Gọvanọ Emmanuel Uduaghan n'oge ahụ n'afọ 2008, wee bụrụ kọmishọna na-ahụ maka omenala na njem nlegharị anya nke Delta State, Nigeria na 2009
Mofe-Damijo lụrụ onye ntaakụkọ/onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Naijiria, May Ellen-Ezekiel (MEE)
Ka ọ nwụsịrị na 1996, Richard Mofe-Damijo lụgharịrị onye TV, Jumobi Adegbesan, onye mechara hapụ TV gawa ụlọ ọrụ.
Mofe-Damijo nwere ụmụ anọ: abụọ na nwunye ya ugbu a na abụọ sitere na alụmdi na nwunye mbụ ya
